title: Path With Minimum Effort
content:
You are a hiker preparing for an upcoming hike. You are given , a 2D array of size , where  represents the height of cell . You are situated in the top-left cell, , and you hope to travel to the bottom-right cell,  (i.e., 0-indexed). You can move up, down, left, or right, and you wish to find a route that requires the minimum effort.
A route's effort is the maximum absolute difference in heights between two consecutive cells of the route.
Return the minimum effort required to travel from the top-left cell to the bottom-right cell.
